pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Frequenz channels[![Build Status](https://github.com/frequenz-floss/frequenz-channels-python/actions/workflows/ci.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/frequenz-floss/frequenz-channels-python/actions/workflows/ci.yaml)[![PyPI Package](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/frequenz-channels)](https://pypi.org/project/frequenz-channels/)[![Docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-latest-informational)](https://frequenz-floss.github.io/frequenz-channels-python/)This repository contains channel implementations for python.## ContributingIf you want to know how to build this project and contribute to it, pleasecheck out the [ContributingGuide](CONTRIBUTING.md).
